DOC.brief_title: Comparison Cardiac Index Cardiac Output Effect During Maintenance Hemodialysis Between Acetate-Free Acetate-Based Online Hemodiafiltration
DOC.criteria: Endstage renal disease patient age 20 year stable clinical status Dialytic age > 6 month Maintenance hemodialysis onlinehemodiafiltration mode King Chulalongkorn Memorial Hospital Use arteriovenous fistula arteriovenous graft vascular access hemodialysis No vascular access recirculation No liver impairment No severe , intractable metabolic acidosis alkalosis ( HCO3 < 15 , > 30 ) No preexist severe , intractable hypocalcemia ( Ca < 7.5 ) clinical hypocalcemia On hemodialysis via tunnel catheter Vascular access recirculation Liver dysfunction Severe , intractable metabolic acidosis alkalosis ( HCO3 < 15 , > 30 ) Preexisting severe , intractable hypocalcemia ( Ca < 7.5 ) clinical hypocalcemia Acute recent myocardial ischemia congestive heart failure ( within 1 month ) Threatening arrhythmia ( VT , VF , sustain SVT , AF rapid ventricular response ) Patients affect acute chronic infection , malignant tumor
